title: What is the minimum order I can place?
description: We accept minimum order of ₹199 or above.

title: Is there any additional charges?
description: Packaging is free of charge & Delivery is free for order above ₹399. ₹49 will be charged as delivery fee for order below ₹399.

title: What are the payment mode accepted?
description: We are accepting Paytm and Cash on Delivery.

title: What if I want to cancel my order?
description: You can cancel your order within a minute. To cancel your order tap on option button in order success page.

title: What if Fooodie contact number is not reachable?
description: If Fooodie contact number is not reachable then you can reach us on +91 9993312277.
